articles.author: Martin Arnold
articles.title: Eurozone inflation falls more than expected to 2.9% - Financial Times
articles.description: Lowest rate for more than 2 years bolsters expectations that ECB will not raise rates further
articles.content:
Eurozone inflation fell to 2.9 per cent in October, its lowest for more than two years, bolstering expectations that the European Central Bank will not raise interest rates further.
